description: unique book with two gray solid cover plates with a grid pattern etched into both front and back; 'ATEQEH' and 'GERHARD MULTERER' printed in bold black ink on front cover plate; secured with ties in strips of black leather; front cover plate opens to reveal dirty white case with two buckles, again with 'ATEQEH' and 'GERHARD MULTERER' printed in black letters; various folded dirty cloth pages with text inside case with rust colored fringes along side; lender's archive #196
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: ATEQEH
